Hydras:

Hydras was really mad and Moving towards Nightshift and grabing hi=
s neck he hissed while he squeezed it and after free secons he release it a=
 little"Tell me something new, you Sneaky-bot??? Should I remind you that I=
, or better said my future self and same time past will murder or murdered =
PRIME???? a prime is like another one... WHY DID YOU DELAY TO REPORT THAT??=
? For first time and much better... WHY YOU ALWAYS APPEAR and DISAPPEAR wit=
h out trace and non knows your where-abouts?  none the higher ranks like ME=
?????"


From: Sandy 
Sent: Monday, April 05, 2010 9:49 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoo=
groups.com 
Subject: Re: BlackFortress


  
Night Shift remains in SUV form=
 and pivots his tires toward Hydras.

"That's right, you don't know what ha=
ppened do ya? Tucson's a Prime, he just got himself a sizeable upgrade from=
 the Matrix. See, with my dual programming, I can get the scoop on any fact=
ion's business I want. And the Autobot programming I got, enables me ta fin=
d these things out as they happen. And judgn' by the way my link reacted, y=
ou thought Rodimus got big guns? This guys' packn' more power than two nucl=
ear warheads combined. C'mon, if ya want power, Rodimus ain't the guy ta ge=
t it from. And I'm sure Rodimus would be really interested in tryn' ta take=
 down Tucson Prime, that's if you guys got enough back bone ta do it. Keep =
in mind, he's got as much strength as Optimus Prime, and that ain't nothn' =
ta sneeze at."

While keeping in Decepticon code, he tries to open his Auto=
bot channel to Lord Elder, keeping him informed of his progress.

ke what, Nightshift?"hissed malicious Hydras while he came in and sit down =

ceptor finished to reprogram Nightlight, and he waited that she woke up

ogroups.com

> Nightshift watches Sco=
rponok. He tries to remain calm and collected, acting like a sly Decepticon=
. Inside he was nervous. If they found out his true faction he would clearl=
y be done for. His resemblence to Tucson's old form was impecable, yet the =
only thing that separated him from Tucson was his black paint job and his a=
ccent. He had been manufactured using the same specs and the same programmi=
ng. Hopefully his configurations would not be found out.
> 
> " What? What'=
reya lookn' at me like that for? I told ya everything ya need ta know and i=
f I was one of them I wouldn'tve done that would I? Nope, not me, look, you=
 guys can trust me, I'm a Decepticon, I may not be able ta fly but I am one=
 of you guys. And thanks ta me ya now know that Tucson's got 'emself a hell=
 of an upgrade. No Autobot would give ya that kinda info."
> 
> He transfor=
ms back into SUV mode.
> 
> "C'mon, I got lots more info where that came fr=
om. But I can't tell ya here. We better get somewhere private where I can g=
ive ya the entire scoop."
> 
> Again, his tires kick up dust around Scorpon=
ok.
> 
> "My bad, my bad. Slag, might be time for me ta get new tires."
>
